channel.description: Week 6 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 5 Due 7 PM Mon: Week 5 Discussion 11:59 PM Friday: Week 6 Quizzes Next Mon: Lab 6 Next Mon: Week 6 Discussion Lab 5 Grading SSH to Frontend SSH to Backend Firewall, Date/Time Apache, DNS, HTTPS Docker Reverse Proxy Speaker: Sarah Allen System Administrator McCown-Gordon Former CIS 527 Student Helpdesk & Support Lab 6 File Servers Drive Mappings Application Servers Working Web Apps Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs. Thick in Labs Chat with me for ideas GitHub Pack https://education.github.com/pack
